756:11: tathā coktam-“idaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurudapādi” iti vistaraḥ|
756:14: tathā coktam-“duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiḥ” iti|
756:34: ityetāni catvāryāryasatyāni parijñeyaprahātavyasākṣātkartavyabhāvayitavyānīti bhagavān pradarśayāmāsa narāmarebhyasteṣāṃ satyadarśaṇa (na)
756:40: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam||
756:48: ‘buddham’ iti viśiṣṭaviśeṣaṇaparicchinno'pi buddhānusāripudgalapratipattyarthaṃ sākṣātpratītapadārthakena nāmnāpadiśyate buddha iti|
756:49: atra buddhaśabdasya prasiddhiḥ budherakarmakatvavivakṣāyāṃ karttari kto bhavati|
756:50: sarve vā jñānārthā gatyarthā iti karmakarttari ktavidhānam|
756:52: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ buddha ityabhidhānaṃ karttari loke prayujyamānam|
756:53: tadyathā nidrāvigame padārthānubodhe'vidyānirāse ca vibuddhaḥ prabuddho devadatta iti|
756:56: yathā vā paripākaviśeṣāt svayameva buddhaṃ padmamevaṃ bhagavānapi prajñādiguṇaprakarṣaparipākād buddho vibuddhaḥ prabuddha iti|
756:70: digātmāno vaiśeṣikaparikalpitā asattvādeva naiva nityāḥ nānityāḥ|
756:83: yadi pratipuruṣaṃ karmāṇi buddhipūrvāṇyabuddhikṛtāni vā pradhāne vidyante sādhāraṇapradhānakalpanāvaiyarthyaṃ tarhi prāptamiti| kiñca,
756:92: ’ prādhānātmakapakṣa ete ca doṣāḥ prasajantyanye'pi copaplavāḥ sādhāraṇatvādakṛtābhyāgamānirmokṣaprasaṅgāt|
756:93: tasmāt trīṇyeva ca sarvajñābhihitānyasaṃskṛtāni nityānīti siddham|
756:110: yasmātsapta cittadhātavaścatvāraścārūpiṇaḥ skandhā ebhyaścatuṣpratyayātmakebhyaḥ pratāyante tadutpattiṃ vā pratyāyante tasmādāyatanāni|
756:116: atha kasmāddvādaśāyatanānyaṣṭādaśa ca dhātavaḥ pṛthaṅnirucyante ? natva(nva)
756:123: dhātuskandhavyavasthā cāyataneṣūkteṣvabhihitakāraṇā bhavanti sulakṣā ceti dhātudeśanā|
756:132: ’ sapta vijñānadhātavo hi deśyamānā buddhyaikatvagrāhaṃ nivartayanti|
756:146: ’ ye khalu buddhyaikatvamadhyavasitā manasaścetanāyāṃ vā rūpacittaikatvaṃ vā teṣā(ṣāṃ)
756:152: svaviṣayālambanakriyāpekṣayā vijñānāntarotpādanādiśaktyapekṣayā caikasya vijñānasya tridhā nirdeśaḥ kriyate-‘manaścittaṃ vijñānaṃ ca’ ityanāgatasyātītasyāpi bhūtabhāvinyā saṃjñayā vyapadeśaḥ|
756:154: sūtre'pi coktam-“yatpunastadbhavati cittamiti vā mana iti vā” iti vistaraḥ|
756:155: tadevaṃ vyācakṣāṇena bhavatā nityaṃ karaṇaṃ mano ‘nityaścātmā kartā’ iti pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati|
756:164: jātisaṃkhyānāṃ pratyekaṃ yathāyogaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ| kasmāt ?
756:167: sacchabdanimittaṃ hi sato bhāvaḥ sattā dravyaṃ prakṛtyarthaḥ|
756:179: yastvayaṃ saṃgravastvādiṣu saṃgrahaḥ proktaḥ sa kādācitkatvād gauṇo mantavyo na mukhyaḥ|
756:184: atha ya ete sūtrāntareṣu skandhāyatanadhātusaṃśabditā dharmāḥ śrūyante te kimeṣveva saṃgrahaṃ gacchanti,
756:188: tatra tāvacchīlaskandhādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ|
756:217: yeṣāṃ tāvadvāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāmaśītidharmaskandhasahastrāṇi rūpaskanghaikadeśena saṃgṛhītāni|
756:220: ayaṃ tvāgamaḥ-“jīvato bhagavato vāṅnāma svabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gauṇamukhyanyāyena|
756:228: ete hi ṣaḍdhātavo garbhāvakrāntikāle maulaṃ sattvadravyaprajñaptyupādānam|
756:229: katham ? yasmādayaṃ kāyākhyaḥ samucchrāyaḥ pṛthivīdhātunā khakkhaṭalakṣaṇena sandhārito bhūtāntaravṛttyudreko'sthisnāyunakhadantaromādisaṃcayaḥ|
756:257: [15] nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu|
756:270: sa hi brāhmaṇaḥ praṣṭā tasminnākāśadhātāvākāśasaṃjñītyata evoktamāloke sati prajñāyate|
756:308: nidarśanaṃ vāsya saṃbandhi vidyata iti sanidarśaṇaḥ (naḥ)||
756:310: saptacittadhātūndharmadhātuṃ ca hitvā daśānye mūrttā dhātavaḥ ‘sapratighā daśa’|
756:318: viṣayapratighātaścakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ rūpādiṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣu pratighātaḥ|
756:319: yasya yasmin vṛttiḥ sannipātalakṣaṇā kāritrākhyā ca sa tasmin pratihanyate tato'nyatrāvṛtteḥ|
756:325: ‘ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi te’ iti ?
756:331: ‘ye viṣayapratighātena sapratighā ālambanapratighātenāpi te’ iti paścātpādakaḥ-ye tāvadālambanapratighātena viṣayapratighātenāpi te syuḥ|
756:347: yathāśāstraṃ kaścit triprakāraḥ kaścidekaprakāraḥ saṃbhavato draṣṭavyaḥ|
756:378: āsravā hi ābhavāgrādyāvadavīcimupādāya cittasantatiṃ strāvayanti svayaṃ ca sravantītyāsravāḥ|
756:384: iti svakriyādvāreṇaiteṣu vargeṣvetā nairuktyasaṃjñā niviśanta ityeṣā vyākhyānītirjyāyasī|
756:387: t, nirvāṇamārgayorapi rūpādivat sāsravatvaprasaṅga iti| gatametat||
756:391: sālambanānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ye prathamāḥ pañca te savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ|
756:397: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne vitarko ṇai(nai)
756:400: atrāha-yadi pañcavijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathaṃ tarhi [a]vikalpā ityucyante ? brūmaḥ
756:402: guṇaḥ svārtho yeṣāṃ te bhavanti ‘guṇasvārthāḥ’| ete hi
756:412: tatrāpi ca smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā ca anusmṛtivikalpaḥ,
756:418: athaiṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ kataradvijñānaṃ kiyadbhiḥ savikalpakam ?
756:425: prathame hi dhyāne yadasamāhitaṃ manovijñānaṃ tat tribhireva|
756:436: kutra kasya ṣaṭprakāraṃ vijñānaṃ kuśalādivikalpakaṃ bhavati ?
756:441: iha tāvaducchinnakuśalamūlasya pañca rūpondriyāśrayabalotpannaṃ darśakaṃ vijñānaṃ kuśalaṃ na vidyate,
756:455: iha kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ darśakaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ ca vikalpakamasti|
756:458: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam||
756:461: kathamasatyātmani śāśvate tadguṇe ca saṃskāre smṛtihetāvasati pratikṣaṇavinaśvareṣu ca vijñāneṣu ca parasparākṛtasaṃketeṣu pūrvānubhūto'rthaḥ smaryate ?
756:478: heyādinā pañca prakāreṇa vijñānena yadanubhūtaṃ tatkatamena smaryate ?
756:493: atha dvādaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ko'rthaḥ kenānubhūtaḥ katibhiḥ smaryate ?
756:501: tatra kiṃ kenānubhūtaṃ ta[d] dvādaśabhirapi smaryate ?
756:536: yatkhalu rūpadhātau anivṛtāvyākṛtenānubhūtaṃ tadārūpyāvyākṛte hitvā tadanyairdaśabhiḥ smaryate||
756:541: ya ete'ṣṭādaśadhātava eṣāṃ kati sālambanāḥ katyanālambanāḥ katyupāttāḥ katyanupāttāḥ kati saṃcitāḥ katyasaṃcitāḥ ?
756:547: ya ete saptacittadhātavo dharmadhātvardhena sahoktāste śabdena sahānupāttāḥ| ato'nye
756:557: atra bhūtāni catvāri bhautikaṃ ca gurutvādisaptaprakāram |
756:566: ta evāṣṭau cakṣurvijñānadhātvādayo [hitvā śeṣā daśa] saṃcitāḥ||
756:577: vipākakāraṇahetvadhīnajanmatvāt naiṣyandikāni cakṣurādīni pañca na vidyante|
756:590: yaścakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ ?
756:591: yo vā cakṣurvijñānardhātunā cakṣudhātunāpi saḥ ? āha|
756:616: “ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ|” iti|
756:633: āpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarmarūpasvabhāvaṃ tadapyāryamārgavirodhitvādvihīnaṃ na tu prahīnaṃ(ṇaṃ)
756:642: kaḥ punaḥ sabhāgārthaḥ ko vā tatsabhāgārthaḥ ?
756:644: yaḥ svakriyāṃ bhajate sa sabhāga ityucyate|
756:645: yaḥ svakriyāvirahitaḥ sa tatsādṛśyamātrabhajamānatvāt tatsabhāga ityākhyāyate|
756:668: prāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rūpāṇi dṛśyante tathā kliṣṭāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayo jñeyaṃ paśyanti|
756:669: yathā tu vigatarajāṃsi niśākarakiraṇāṃśukāvaguṇṭhitāyāṃ triyāmāyāṃ rūpāṇi dṛśyante,
756:671: yathā tu meghapaṭalāvaguṇṭhite divākarakiraṇānudbhāsite divase rūpāṇi dṛśyante tadvacchaikṣī dṛṣṭiḥ paśyati|
756:675: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ||
756:684: yattūktaṃ daśadharmā dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ prāpnuvantītyatra vijñānasya mukhyadarśanakalpaṇā(nā)
756:690: yadi tāvaccakṣuḥ paśyati yāvatkāyaḥ spṛśati tato yugapat sarvaviṣayopabhogaprasaṃgaḥ|
756:694: atha prajñā paśyati śrotravijñānādiṣvapi prajñā vidyata iti tatrāpi darśaṇa(na)prasaṃgaḥ|
756:695: atha cakṣurādisāmagrī paśyati sāpi khalu cakṣurādisāmagryaṅgavyatiriktā svabhāvakriyā[']bhāvānna vidyate|
756:703: hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya kriyāmātraṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti cet|
756:737: vaṃ kalpayati-‘kāraṇabhūtābhyāṃ prāgutpannābhyāṃ cakṣūrūpābhyāṃ kāryabhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ sahaikasmin kāle nāvatiṣṭhate’ iti tasya sakṣādviṣayānubhavanābhāvādanumānāgamābhāvaprasaṃgaḥ|
756:742: ya ete vijñānacakṣūrūpādayaḥ svahetusāmagrīprabodhitaśaktayaḥ [te] viṣayaprativijñaptyālocanāvabhāsanākhyāṃ yugapat saudhīṃ saudhīṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyanta iti yuktimatī nītiḥ|
756:746: yathā vā devadattaḥ sthālījalajvalanataṇḍulādiṣu satsvapi pāke pravartamāne svasyāmadhiśrayano(ṇo)
756:747: dakāsecanataṇḍalāvapanadarvīparighaṭṭanācāmanisrāvaṇakriyāyāṃ labdhasāmarthyaḥ sādhanasanniyoge ca paraprāptaiśvaryo devadattaḥ prādhānyātpacatātyucyate|
756:749: staṇḍulānāṃ vikledo vivakṣitaḥ pāko vā tadā jalānalayoḥ prādhānyādvyapadeśo bhavatyambu kledayatyagniḥ pacatīti|
756:754: tulye hi prathamadhyānacakṣurvijñāne dvitīyādiṣu cakṣuṣprakarṣāddarśanaprakarṣo dṛśyata iti|
756:756: paśyati manasi tu bhaktyā prajñāvṛttirupacaryate manasā paśyati” iti|
756:776: śrotraṃ tra sarvagataṃ prāpyaiva sarvaṃ śrṛṇoti|
756:779: yāvatā hi kālena devadattaḥ svapāṇitalalekhāṃ paśyati tāvataiva candralekhām|
756:781: gatimanto hi devadattādayo dūraṃ cirādgacchantyāsannaṃ kṣipramiti|
756:785: yathā khalu yāvatā kālena pradīpo nediṣṭhaṃ rūpamabhivyanakti tāvatā daviṣṭhaṃ tadvaditi|
756:796: yadyaprāptagrāhi cakṣuḥ brahmaloke brahmāṇaṃ kasmānna paśyati ?
756:799: yathā tulye'pyaprāptākarṣaṇe na prācīno'yaskānto maṇirudīcīnamayaḥ samākarṣati tadvaditi||
756:807: yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānāni ekabhaumāni,
756:810: tatra kāmadhātūpapannasya tāvat svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhaumam|
756:811: tasyaivāsya dhyānacakṣuṣā svarūpāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike dvayaṃ prathamāddhyānāt|
756:819: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūrūpe dvitīyadhyānabhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacāro vijñānaṃ prathamadhyānāt|
756:820: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato vijñātavyam|
756:823: adharāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ rūpāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi|
756:824: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣurdvitīyāt|
756:828: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūrūpe tadbhūmike śeṣaṃ svabhūmikam evaṃ tṛtīyādidhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam|
756:829: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāsaṃbhavaṃ draṣṭavyam||
756:831: [48] na hyūrdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ|
756:832: vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ||
756:834: tatra yadmūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikamūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadhobhaumikam|
756:835: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vāsya rūpaṃ gocarī bhavati nordhvabhūmikam|
756:837: asya tu cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayībhavati|
756:840: [49] nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ|
756:841: vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ||
756:861: yadanyataḥ kāyo'nyataścakṣuranyataḥ rūpamanyato vijñānaṃ gṛhītvā paśyanti|
756:862: vibhūni ca śarīrāṇi nirmāya manojavayā ri(ṛ)
756:863: ddhyā gatvā buddhā bhagavanto yathecchaṃ lokadhātvā(tva)
756:865: divyābhyāṃ cakṣuḥśrotrābhyāṃ rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdāṃśca śrutvā yathecchaṃ yugapadanekāni pāñcagatikāni śarīrāṇi nirmāyānekagatidhātvā(tva)
756:888: trayānā(ṇā)mapi khalveteṣāmekasvabhāvatvādekagocaratvādekakāryatvācca dvitve'pi sa[tyekādhipatyaṃ caikadhātutā ca] nirvarta(rte)te|
756:890: ye tu kathayanti “śobhārthaṃ tu dvayodbhavaḥ” iti teṣāṃ ślīpadagantra (nḍa)
756:903: nirvāṇameva paramārthato dravyamityucyate yato dharmadhātureva tadyogāddravyavānityākhyāyate|
756:904: kasmācca sarvasaṃskṛtānāṃ kṣaṇikatve sati traya evāntyā dhātavaḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante ?
756:923: ye dharmā vijñānaniśrayāḥ samanantarā api te ?
756:953: dharmadhātuḥ khalu kaścitkāmāvacara eva yathā pratighādayaḥ|
756:959: evamanyānapi dhātūnanenaiva yathoktena nyāyena ‘yathāyogaṃ vinirdiśet’ iti||
756:961: yadā pṛthagjanaścakṣurdhātuṃ rūpāptaṃ parijānāti tadā katamāddhātorvairāgyamāpnoti ?
756:972: tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcana||
756:974: bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ saṃyojanaṃ tu na dhātuparicchinnamiti na kiñcittadā jahāti||
756:977: [65] na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau|
756:997: ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān||
756:1000: śubhakṛtsnācca vairāġyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu||
